review: It's so close to being a truly fantastic device but instead it just kind of sucks at everything.  I can't chromecast to it from my computer only my phone/tablet.  When I do chromecast from my phone I often have to connect, then disconnect and reconnect to get it to work.Whenever I watch any content from any source (amazon, netflix, kodi) I frequently get small stutters during playback which are very annoying.I'll be throwing it in a box and going back to my chromecast.
